paragraphs.text: I think ultraconservative Republicans anywhere in the United States need to be scared right now because we have shown that a motivated base and a well-run campaign can win. We did not lose to Estes so much as we lost to a president, a vice president, a speaker of the house, and multiple senators coming in and helping out. So in 2018 when there’s 435 races going on, he’s not going to be able to do that for everybody. I think that those congressmen and senators need to be looking at their positions on things, because there’s going to be backlash and there’s going to be people who lose their seats in 2018 as a result of it.

dfdde2fcabda.title: You came close, but you STILL LOST.

paragraphs.name: ec95
paragraphs.text: You came close, but you STILL LOST. The problem is, he republicans in the area did not take the democrat serious, thinking they did not have to get out to vote. The real race is in Georgia shortly.. Here is where the republicans need to get the vote out, and out spend the dems.

7f1e89f13147.title: now losing is a victory. Democrat logic. will work great in 2018.

paragraphs.text: now losing is a victory. Democrat logic. will work great in 2018.

96fe1a14e626.title: It was actually 7 points, FYI, and that’s not really a “narrow” defeat.

paragraphs.name: 5ec9
paragraphs.text: It was actually 7 points, FYI, and that’s not really a “narrow” defeat.

503357eafd0f.title: The Democratic Party should be proud of James Thompson.

paragraphs.name: 38d7
paragraphs.text: The Democratic Party should be proud of James Thompson. He ran a great campaign in the little time he had to run for office. An he is so right to say that Democrats have to get out and listen to the voters. An make clear how they stand on the issues facing the nation. For then the voters will get a true understanding of the party’s values. An not let the Republicans define us.

f49886b8ef71.title: In ’18 the Demos will have the White House..The

paragraphs.name: a866
paragraphs.text: In ’18 the Demos will have the White House..The Senate..The House.. and will begin the short voyage of loading an unbeatable Liberal Majority for perhaps 50+ years On the Supreme Court as Mr.”G” is Leaving W/Trump et al

8f2dd9fb4269.title: Great, we won some moral victory.

paragraphs.name: bde0
paragraphs.text: Great, we won some moral victory. Finishing second in an election is still a loss. If losing by 7% is a win, obviously the bar is too low.

f5d1c2c7bab0.title: The establishment Dems haven’t learned a thing.

paragraphs.name: b9cb
paragraphs.text: The establishment Dems haven’t learned a thing. Thompson asked the DCCC for a lousy $20,000 to help with his campaign and they said no. Meanwhile, he raised a lot of money from small donors. And when polling and early voting showed him doing well, the DCCC finally showed up — the day before the election — and helped make phone calls. Too little, too late — and then they wonder why they can’t win locally.

virtuals.subtitle: No, you have shown that you can come close, but have not shown you can win.

77794e8df8d0.title: Howad Dean had it right with his 50 state strategy and then (I think) it was Rahm Emmanuel that…

paragraphs.name: 7aba
paragraphs.text: Howad Dean had it right with his 50 state strategy and then (I think) it was Rahm Emmanuel that took us back to a selected state strategy. There are millions of people out there in red states that agree with the Democratic policies but they never get a real chance to find out what those policies are because the national D’s ignore them, at your and my peril.

paragraphs.name: 447d
paragraphs.text: All you need to see:

RNC/GOP sent in money … and big names. DNC did just about nothing again. With the Congress members he selected, Trump gave Democrats an opportunity to get a start on 2018. Instead, the DNC is shooting itself in both feet.

liberals win. center right hacks dont win. ask clinton. us democrats best get the FDR going. forget the corp money and go after votes. sanders out raised the corps so even the most power politic moron in the dnc should pull thier head out.GOP lite aint making it kids. the saying a fish rots from the head fits todays democratic leadership well.

70397230d1a4.title: I stopped giving money to the DCCC long ago, when they failed to adopt Howard Dean’s 50 state…

paragraphs.text: I stopped giving money to the DCCC long ago, when they failed to adopt Howard Dean’s 50 state strategy. We need to contest every election at every level.

32cfb3db62e7.title: I’m not all that certain that Democrats want a congressional majority and the White House together.

paragraphs.name: 5eda
paragraphs.text: I’m not all that certain that Democrats want a congressional majority and the White House together. That would force them to produce legislation that might cut into their corporate donations or show voters their true corporate colors. It’s sad that anyone who might support the time proven New Deal economics doesn’t have a party to support them, but…

384da5022c72.title: Honorable veteran did amazing considering that Trump wasn’t robo-calling folks on this behalf, that…

paragraphs.name: 9fae
paragraphs.text: Honorable veteran did amazing considering that Trump wasn’t robo-calling folks on this behalf, that’s the reason why the other guy won. He did it based on his merit: hard working veteran, father, husband and overall honest man.

17c3358d21e3.title: James Thompson’s articulation alone is like a breath of fresh air sweeping through the Great Plains…

paragraphs.name: 06fc
paragraphs.text: James Thompson’s articulation alone is like a breath of fresh air sweeping through the Great Plains. I see a victory for this very qualified candidate in 2018 when he runs the race again. But really, the DCCC needs to do exaclty what he said: “ DCCC should be doing polls in every single race on a semi-regular basis to make sure that if they see chances like we had, they can react to it.”

edbb07cf6cff.title: Another reason why I will NEVER give the DNC another dime.

paragraphs.name: 4ec2
paragraphs.text: Another reason why I will NEVER give the DNC another dime. I’ll contribute directly to the folks I support. The DNC cannot be trusted to do the right thing, even if it is in a losing cause. Proper DNC support and messaging could have brought this into the win column.

paragraphs.name: 6e2b
paragraphs.text: Onward.

paragraphs.name: d238
paragraphs.text: A next step is for city kids to connect with country kids. Listen, learn in the rural KS-04 counties. Remember, two kids from Butler County went on to help raise their grandson, the 44th President of the United States.
